Frequently Asked Questions

Common questions about LeafLock pricing and plans.

Is LeafLock really free for self-hosting?

Yes! LeafLock is completely open source under the MIT license. You can download, deploy, and use it on your own infrastructure at no cost. The source code is available on GitHub for complete transparency.

What's included in Professional Services?

Our Professional Services include deployment assistance, architecture consulting, custom integrations, and priority support. We help you get LeafLock running optimally in your environment with ongoing assistance as needed.

Do you offer managed hosting?

Currently, LeafLock is designed for self-hosting to maintain maximum security and data sovereignty. However, we provide comprehensive deployment and management services through our Professional and Enterprise plans.

How does Enterprise support work?

Enterprise customers receive dedicated 24/7 support, SLA guarantees, high-availability deployment assistance, and compliance guidance. We work closely with your team to ensure optimal performance and security.

Ready to Get Started?

Join thousands of users securing their notes with end-to-end encryption and zero-knowledge architecture.
